title: When My Jungler Wants CS Tax After a Gank
body:
Was the gank successful, with a kill or pushing them out of lane?

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-djXiasOQL98/UbgrxGHXN9I/AAAAAAAAMQE/Z8K1V-_k5g0/s1600/allow-it.gif

Did you fail and get one of us killed or just do nothing at all?

http://replygif.net/i/272.gif

replies.body: if the jungler gets the kill instead of the laner, he shouldnt tax lane
That's dependent. Sometimes the laner has an excess of gold and just wants to B, in which case the best thing the jungler can do is help push the wave into the tower.
until  you have 6 items an elixer and an upgraded trinket there is no such thing as an excess of gold
Jungle, then get back to me.
Chill dude.

I'm a support main, so I'll gank a lane, give the laner the kill, then take one caster and leave.
My lategames are always bad for some reason.
If I wander to help a stalemating lane I'm usually fine with the assist and taking the tower.
Oh, when I'm actually supporting I won't take any minions. I meant when I'm jungling, I barely take any taxes. It just feels so wrong.
it is when you have an item dedicated to giving you extra gold when you kill jungle camps
Did you open an image in Notepad and then copy-paste it here?

No, I deleted that
I CANT EVEN KILL THINGS RIGHT! D:

My friend was once so bad at supporting she killed somebody with Soraka's ult.
You are like the opposite of that. :P

Wait, what?
HOW?!?!??!
To this day I wonder what actually happened.

Think of the Jungler as the IRS... he is gonna tax you.. if you complain... he will tax you more... and then fine you (300 gp)
if you got the 300 gp fine first, you probably deserved it
if he died and gave the lane a double kill... tax returns are pretty shitty sometimes...
I only tax if I fail a gank, specifically if I fail and its because my laner didn't get off his farming ass to help. then I tax, because I need the gold more to stay relevant.

So you don't bother to check if a laner is able to assist in a gank and then punish them for that?
Way to go.

I calculate how much it would take to kill the enemy, whenever I gank, I come in KNOWING that I'll get something. sometimes I need my laner to be there. fyi, I also tend to initiate ganks when the laner is in position, or when the enemy is Horribly out of positiondue to extending past their minions. when a gank of mine fails, its because my laner is either stupid or a coward.
Usually when I meet people like you I tell them "_get out, I don't need your ganks_".
dont worry, I dont gank scared people anyway.
Better this than to have a loser like you lose the lane by being too brave.
too bad you already lost lane, from not being agro enough to trade.

I never said I'm only AFK farming the lane.
I did however say, that you graciously coming to my lane and taking minions from me for not reacting to an obviously bad gank that'd get at least one of use killed, is not welcomed and you can whine somewhere else.

my ganks are almost never bad, you're assuming that they are, and in that situation you may be correct, but as it stands, I make plays that sometimes require the proper assistance from my laner, and if they don't provide it, I'm gonna take some farm, so that I can stay relevant.

You see, as a jungler, my ganks have to have relevance, and if they don't then I'm getting behind for nothing. to stop this from happening, You need to achieve a kill in a gank, and personally, I'm fine with walking away with the enemy having spent a summoner spell. but If I take my time to step from my jungle to help your ass, and you don't have the decency to follow up, then I will take your farm. when I said you weren't agro enough to trade, I was stipulating that you would need to be playing like that to not follow up.

I've never been whining, you came to me complaining

Well, you put a keyword somewhere in this post.
I only ask for ganks if I'm really in a hole. If I was able to farm peacefully and you came to gank, you must've read the chat wrong, because I clearly wasn't in need of a gank.

But let's stop talking hypotheticals and part on good terms, shall we?
I agree, have a good rest of your day.

Or when they steal your gromp, so you tax their lane like:
http://www.awesomelyluvvie.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/Breaking-Bad-Felina-1.gif

Okay, I wrote a guide, but lost that. Then I tried to imbed an image, but lost that too.
So here: Do whatever the hell you want. Just don't be a dick about it.
I only takes cs from lanes as a jungler when you aren't in your lane. and your walking back.....you can tell me no all you want but you cant stop the Yi from taking what he wants.
http://pre10.deviantart.net/cc45/th/pre/i/2014/312/a/6/aram_adventures___back_away_from_that_door__by_farahboom-d85pj5b.png
